MemberSignature.Usage: rankingCatalog.CrossValidate (data, estimator, numberOfFolds, labelColumnName, rowGroupColumnName, seed)

Docs.param: The data to run cross-validation on.

The name of the groupId column in , which is used to group rows. This column will automatically be used as SamplingKeyColumn when splitting the data for Cross Validation, as this is required by the ranking algorithms If no row grouping will be performed.
Seed for the random number generator used to select rows for cross-validation folds.
Docs.summary: Run cross-validation over folds of , by fitting , and respecting if provided. Then evaluate each sub-model against and return metrics.
Docs.returns: Per-fold results: metrics, models, scored datasets.
